name: Slime Adventure (itch) (JanieMarie)
description:
SLIME ADVENTURE

WASD - Keys to move

Arrow keys - Use them to direct an attack.

An action packed 2D RPG that's baised around this little slime guy.

He's a cute little fella that just wants to grow up!

(Project is still in way early development, currently at the combat testing phase, if you have the time please leave some feedback. Currently my passion project.)
